citations.narrative:
On the morning of February 25, 2024, a South American Coati was found deceased in the enclosure, entwined in rope
used to support enrichment materials. It was noted by staff that the rope was inappropriately thin for coatis. Facilities must
be maintained using materials and enrichment appropriate for the species to be housed in that enclosure.
Correct from this day forward.

While much of the housekeeping around the facility has been addressed, a structure in the yard open to the wallaby and
cavy remains in disrepair, exposing these animals to injury risk. Further, a large accumulation of trash remains that
promotes breeding and living areas for rodents and pests.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
On the morning of February 25, 2024, a South American Coati was found deceased in the enclosure, entwined in rope 
used to support enrichment materials. It was noted by staff that the rope was inappropriately thin for coatis. Facilities must 
be maintained using materials and enrichment appropriate for the species to be housed in that enclosure. 
 
Correct from this day forward. 
3.131(c)  Repeat
   
Sanitation. 
While much of the housekeeping around the facility has been addressed, a structure in the yard open to the wallaby and 
cavy remains in disrepair, exposing these animals to injury risk. Further, a large accumulation of trash remains that 
promotes breeding and living areas for rodents and pests. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
